caption.title: Estimates of field-scale mass loading from septic tank, sand filter and soil-based treatment for an advanced system with a shallow narrow (SND) or GeoMat Â® (GEO) soil treatment area, and for a conventional system with a pipe and stone (P&S) soil treatment area.
caption.p: Removal values (%) are for the previous step in the treatment train. Units are kg yr -1 except for fecal coliform bacteria (FCB), which are CFU yr -1.
